price: Na Musa alipo fika utu-uzima baraabara, tulimpa akili na ilimu. Na hivi ndivyo tunavyo walipa walio wema.
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
footnotes: Na Musa alipo kwisha kuwa mtu mzima, na akakamilika, Mwenyezi Mungu alimpa hikima na ilimu. Na hisani kama hii tuliyo mpa Musa na mama yake, tunawapa wema wote kwa ajili ya wema wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walammā balagha ashuddahu wa-is'tawā ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wakadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
